name: I Think I'm Evil
description:
I Think I'm Evil is a game where you play as Jennifer against an assault of enemies in a Cyberpunk-esque world. The game is a mix of Hotline Miami, Superhot, and Enter the Gungeon.

In the game time only moves when you are moving and you have to weave in and out of bullets while taking down the enemies. 

The game was developed in Unity and the build uploaded here only works with Xbox controllers.   

I worked as the programmer and game designer of the game.
